__comments.websocket.retry.waiting.milliseconds: Reconnect when the WebSocket has no traffic for a specified duration (ms)
__comments.polling.bookticker.prev.millisconds: Subtract this offset (ms) from the current time
__comments.polling.bookticker.term.millisconds: Polling interval in ms (100ms => 10 times per second)
__comments.use.auto.start: Whether to auto-start on application launch
__comments.auto.start.exchange.name: Exchange name (upbit, binance, bitmex)
__comments.binance.use.polling.bookticker: Whether to use REST API for top-of-book (bookTicker)
__comments.binance.orderbook.snapshot.counter: If binance.use.polling.bookticker=false, send a snapshot periodically (every 1000 updates)
__comments.upbit.polling.sleep.milliseconds: Delay after a single REST API call (ms)
